title: Episode 182: Feminism Looks Good On You with Kate Manne
itunes:title: Episode 182: Feminism Looks Good On You with Kate Manne
itunes:subtitle: Doree makes a plan for her planner and Kate makes a plan to start hiking. Then, Kate Manne, author of Entitled: How Male Privilege Hurts Women, joins them to talk about animals as self-care; how misogyny influences the cultural conversation around self...
description:
Doree makes a plan for her planner and Kate makes a plan to start hiking. Then, Kate Manne, author of Entitled: How Male Privilege Hurts Women, joins them to talk about animals as self-care; how misogyny influences the cultural conversation around self-care, skincare, and beauty; and why she loves furniture shopping at antique stores. (Note: this interview contains a discussion about sexual harassment and assault.)


  • To leave a voicemail or text for a future episode, reach us at 781-591-0390. You can also email the podcast at forever35podcast@gmail.com.
  • Visit forever35podcast.com for links to everything we mention on the show.
  • Follow us on Twitter (@Forever35Pod) and Instagram (@Forever35Podcast) and join the Forever35 Facebook Group (Password: Serums). 
  • Sign up for the newsletter at forever35podcast.com/newsletter.
